short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize new tab with the Cyberpunk HD Wallpaper extension and have unique hometab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Cyberpunk HD Wallpapers extension can turn your chrome new tab into an attractive and dynamic browsing experience. Our stunning background themes can enhance the appearance of your desktop, laptop, or PC.

This extension offers several key features:

1. Sogou/Google/Bing etc search options
2. Other search engines for web search
3. Adding an optional custom search engine
4. Customize your browsing experience by randomizing Cyberpunk background themes using the settings option.
5. Access popular sites quickly through Google search.
6. Stay connected with quick access to your email and social media accounts.
7. Keep track of the current date and time with automatic display.
8. Navigate to your browsing history with ease.
9. Save time by adding frequently visited websites to the Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. You can shuffle through a vast collection of Cyberpunk wallpapers every time you launch a new tab.
